nodes.text: A ghost was a type of figure in the folklore of the Jedi Knights and the Ewoks of Bright Tree Village, located on the Forest Moon of Endor. During the yearly festival known as Hallowe'en, many Ewoks dressed up as ghosts as part of the festivities. A ghost costume consisted of a white bolt of cloth pulled over the Ewok's head with round circles serving as eye holes. In 3 ABY, for instance, the Ewoks Teebo and Wicket W. Warrick chose to wear ghost costumes for the holiday. In this guise, Teebo scared Warrick as a prank.
In real life, ghosts appear in most belief systems. They are generally believed to be the lingering spirit of a deceased human.
